nodes.text: The Bavakar strength system was an implant used around the time of the Jedi Civil War. The device was used to stimulate a person's body to perform well above its normal level. Only those in fairly good physical condition could handle the use of the strength system.
In the video game Star Wars: Knights of the Old Republic II: The Sith Lords, the playable character must have a constitution attribute of 16 or higher to use the implant.
